message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your perspective on the market value, this product offers unique advantages that justify a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,900,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
I'm still not convinced that the price is right. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,600,000. I think that's a fair price for this product.
